text: Motion
Motion
Mini-drama, huh?

All of us in L'Antica appearing, and we're singing
the theme song too...!? Sounds great~! I'm excited~!

It's meant to provide a calming break and energy for
tomorrow to viewers tired from daily work or study.

The setting is a cafe that could be anywhere, a moment in time.
The story of the manager, the crew, and the regular customers...
I see...

A show that can be watched leisurely
at the end of the day. Sounds nice, doesn't it?

Yeah, that's the idea. Although this time,
we're the ones providing the relaxation.

Heh, I see.
â”€So, have the roles been decided yet?

They're still adjusting things around.
Seems like we can voice our preferences if we have any.

The roles are manager, crew, and regular customers...
The manager is... Kogatan, right?

Of course it's gotta be her~?
She can even make delicious Neapolitan~!

Uh, isn't that more like Kiriko's thing~? If someone
else were the manager, it'd turn into a noisy shop~

Hehe... I'd like to visit...
Mamimi-chan's cafe too...

I wanna go too. A shop with unique personalities.
If it were Kiririn Cafe... it'd have a healing vibe, right?

If that's the case, Yuika's cafe would seem stylish...
Sakuya's would likely be a cozy, comforting cafe, wouldn't it~?

A soothing vibe, huh?
Yeah, I can see that.

Yeah, right~? Sakuya is gentle~ Surely, she'd
think of lots of things to make her customers happy!
Heh... Thank you.

But isn't it Kogane who gives words like that?
She seems more fitting as the manager, don't you think?
